us.pserver.remote

Class AbstractServer

  • java.lang.Object
    • us.pserver.remote.AbstractServer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable, Server
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    NetworkServer

    public abstract class AbstractServer
extends java.lang.Object
implements Server
    Classe abstrata que implementa funcionalidades básicas de um servidor de objetos, como getters e setters.
    Version:
    1.0 - 21/01/2014
    Author:
    Juno Roesler - juno.rr@gmail.com
    See Also:
    Server
